title: Oscillating validation loss
body_html:
I am training a deep CNN for image dehazing, and during training I plot the training and the validations losses. I plot the validation loss every 1 epoch. I do all the process on Tensorflow framework in Ubuntu 16 . The problem is my training loss decrease really well but my validation loss oscillates and it does not have a decreasing shape. Is it normal?

Here are the images of training and validation loss plots. The orange one is the training loss and the blue one is the validation loss.

The x-axis on the train plot is the iteration number and the x-axis on the validation plot is the epoch number.

I really appreciate if you help me with this problem to figure out what part of my approach is wrong
